page.title: 11Manor Farm, Swineshead
page.content: Manor Farm is a red brick over timber frame house dating from 1600, with adjustments and additions to the present day. The owners have decided to branch into the bed and breakfast business. 1985 is their 3rd year and each year their success grows. There are two rooms available for letting. Guests can enjoy staying in the peace and quiet of Swineshead knowing that they are in easy reach of main tourist areas. The business is registered with the English Tourist Board and the AA and also with a new group that has been formed this year called the Bedfordshire Farm and Country Holiday Group. Guests come from as far afield as India, America and Australia and getting nearer to home Keysoe.
